mapper.select:
select t.id from travels t where t.is_deleted = 'N' and ( t.name like concat('%',concat(#{info},'%')) or t.address like concat('%',concat(#{info},'%')) or t.publish_date like concat('%',concat(#{info},'%')) or t.opentime like concat('%',concat(#{info},'%')) or t.budget like concat('%',concat(#{info},'%')) or t.brief_desc like concat('%',concat(#{info},'%')) or t.traffic_info like concat('%',concat(#{info},'%')) or t.resraurant_info like concat('%',concat(#{info},'%')) or t.hotel_info like concat('%',concat(#{info},'%'))
)
